detail_desc: Polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend with long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with an elasticated hem and functional fastening for easier nursing access.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved dress in fine-knit organic cotton pointelle with a button placket and seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Picot trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow metal-chain shoulder strap, zip at the top and inner compartment. Lined. Size 2.5x17x23 cm.
Lace body with flounced sleeves, flounces at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Narrow, elasticated seam at the hips and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.

Maxi dress in a patterned weave in a narrow cut at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an open back with horizontal ties. Seam with a lace trim at the waist and a concealed zip in one side. Partly lined.
Mermaid fancy dress costume in glossy jersey with a glittery pattern at the top, glittery, detachable satin fin at the back, and lined tulle skirt.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a narrow elasticated edge, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Metal earrings in the shape of a face. Length 5 cm.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a heart-shaped metal buckle. Width approx. 2 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a patch pocket at the back.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Waist bag in woven fabric with sequins, a zip at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Size approx. 14x16x30 cm.
Push-up bralette in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and racer back. No fasteners.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back. long sleeves with buttoned cuffs,and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Nylon jacket with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Short, fitted skirt in a jacquard weave with a high waist, concealed zip and a small slit at the back. The polyester content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Top and leggings with a motif. Longer top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif and long raglan sleeves. Leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, high slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, side seams, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Short, padded jacket in a patterned weave with a zip down the front, welt side pockets and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a deep neckline at the front and a chest pocket.
Oversized T-shirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and a cut-out V-neck section at the back with decorative crossover straps.
Linen joggers with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Joggers in soft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake front pockets, a fake fly and elasticated hems.
Imitation leather sandals with narrow straps at the front and an adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Heel 1 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with flatlock seams. Long balloon sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Soft brushed inside.
Two-strand metal chain necklace. One of the chains has a pendant. Adjustable length 40-50 cm.
Leggings in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Flared, calf-length skirt in sturdy satin with a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
V-neck playsuit in a crinkled weave with lace trims. Buttons at the top, wide, 3/4-length sleeves, an elasticated seam and tie belt at the waist and short, wide legs. Unlined.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in soft, patterned viscose twill with elastication at the back of the waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs. Loose fit.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with a press-stud at the sides and frill-trimmed straps with adjustable fasteners. Heart-shaped chest pocket, fake front pockets and a back pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes in sizes 1-4Y), and elasticated hems.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of joggers. T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a print motif on one leg. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Jumper in soft, fine-knit slub cotton with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with roll edges at the cuffs. Narrow ribbing around the neckline and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey. Short sleeves with striped, ribbed trims.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, and medium coverage at the back.
Sandals with imitation suede straps, an elastic heel strap and wedge heels. Satin insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 6 cm.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders with press-studs at one side, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots in grained imitation leather with a shimmering metallic finish, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Twill linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Short-sleeved sports top in patterned, fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with ventilating mesh side panels. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in glittery, lightweight slub jersey with crossover straps at the back.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in stretch jersey with draping at the top and a gathered seams at the sides for best fit over the tummy. Lined.
Two-strand necklace of thin metal chains with metal pendants and plastic beads. Adjustable length approx. 38-45 cm.
Hat in a soft, fine knit with a faux fur pompom at the top and embroidery on the turned-up hem.

Longer blouse in lightweight, softly draping twill with a sheen. Small, gathered stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long-sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and covered buttons at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with flounced trims and an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in waffled cotton jersey. Bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and button fly.
Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, leggings and hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Short, fitted dress in soft satin. Draped neckline at the front, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Top in airy, nepped jersey with a round neck, long sleeves and a lace-trimmed hem.

Padded, gently fitted jacket in woven fabric with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood, zip down the front and elastic drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, discreet side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Lined. Polyester filling.
Soft slippers in velour with appliqués in the shape of a unicorn head at the front, wings at the sides and a faux fur tail. Anti-slip protectors on the soles.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
Iron-on fabric patches to patch and repair garments.
Bodysuit in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long, embroidered sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Bra top in soft microfibre that gives the bust a natural shape and light support. Lined front and folded, glued edges at the top for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.
Short, flounced dress in an airy weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Lined.
Fancy dress costume in printed jersey with long sleeves, long legs and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with ribbed shafts and elasticated tops.
Top in soft fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose blend.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Wide blouse in a soft weave with gathered details, a stand-up collar with buttons at the back of the neck and long, raglan, balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Shorts in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a concealed zip.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a fold-up hem.

Jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a drawstring hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with gathered seams and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
